entry.source: {F812}Master Therion\0{F87A,0}{F813,1,413204}You shall soon learn why others fear{F801}me and tremble at the very mention{F801}of "the Beast."{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Master Therion\0{F87A,0}{F813,1,413204}You shall soon learn why others fear{F801}me and tremble at the very mention{F801}of "the Beast."{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Master Therion\0{F87A,0}{F813,1,413206}Gah... To think that I would be{F801}defeated now, and here...{F801}{F802}You have sought to defeat me, and{F801}you have succeeded...{F801}{F802}Quite impressive.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Master Therion\0{F87A,0}{F813,1,413206}Gah... To think that I would be{F801}defeated now, and here...{F801}{F802}You have sought to defeat me, and{F801}you have succeeded...{F801}{F802}Quite impressive.{F801}
